text: junimkkeseo adam-ui husondeul-eul il-eukyeo geudeullo hayeogeum seuseulo jung eonke halilaneun malsseum-i gyesyeoss-euni naega neohui junim-i anideonyo lago hasini geuleohseubnida jeohuineun junim-i sim-eul jeung-eonhanaida lago geudeul-i daedabhadeola ineun neohuiga simpan-ui nal ulineun ie gwanhayeo alji mosha yeossseubnida lago malhaji ani hado leug ham-ila
